node.NodeData module¶

Created on 2019年9月3日

@author: danny

class node.NodeData.NodeData(address=None, PublicKey=None, ID=None)¶

Bases: object

a NodeData should content IP, PublicKey and ID

_address¶

tuple – binding (IPAddress, port)

_PublicKey¶

RSA PublicKey for sign

_ID¶

Node ID

Note

you should not change data!!

GetAddress()¶
GetByteStringPubKey()¶

convert public key to “string” format if you need to send to other or save at disk

GetData()¶

return self in “dict” format

Returns:{ ‘address’ : self._address, ‘PublicKey’ : self.GetByteStringPubKey(), ‘ID’ : self._ID }
